A thief. From klepto; a stealer.

15.parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular

In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

15.parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular

From askemon; an indecency; by implication, the pudenda.
